title: GetScheduleDefault (Method)
text:
METHOD GetScheduleDefault : CmpBACnet.IEC_BACNET_STATUS
Gets the contents of the Schedule_Default-Property of this BACnet-Object. Eventually, if value wasnât allocated before
the call of this function, the retriefed value.Buffer.pBuffer pointer has to be freed using
FreeStackAllocatedMemory
again!

rows.Name: value
rows.Comment:
value.buffer.pBuffer has to have an allocated memory, which fits the dataâs needs (is at least allocated big enough!) or has to
be freed using FreeStackAllocatedMemory after usage!
